Lopsided projects: Lagos is no mans land Bwala)
Thu, 04 Sep 2025
ABUJA SPECIAL Adviser to the President on Policy Communication, Mr Daniel Bwala, has said Lagos State occupies a unique place in Nigerias economic life and deserves massive federal investment. On Sunday, the Federal Government dismissed claims that approvals for infrastructure projects across the geopolitical zones were lopsided. 2026 WCQ: Lookman, Dessers arrive Super Eagles camp) - The Sun
Thu, 04 Sep 2025
In preparation for Saturdays 2026 FIFA World Cup qualifying match against Rwanda, Ademola Lookman and Cyriel Dessers have arrived at the Super Eagles camp in Uyo. The team now has 17 players at the Four Points by Sheraton Hotel in Ikot Ekpene. It is still anticipated that six more players will arrive in camp.
